title: How to improve the quality of diamond open access publication? Diamas outputs available to researchers and organizations
content: The EU-funded Diamas project, which ended last year, created several tools for diamond open access journals to improve their quality. This blog article presents the key outputs concerning quality standards and guidelines, the use of the OJS platform, the discoverability of diamond OA journals, and the sustainability of publishing. title: Achieving speed and scale with integrity in scholarly publishing – MDPI’s response to the downgrading of JUFO level
content: The debate on scientific publishing continues. A year ago, a total of 271 journals from MDPI and Frontiers publishers were dropped to level 0 in the Publication Forum’s (JUFO) classification as part of the evaluation of journals operating in the grey area.
